reviews.review_content:
This is a review for Rose Gardner rather than for French I, because the content of French I probably requires no explanation. 
If you're interested in learning French at Columbia, I can't recommend Rose more highly. She was very good-humoured, very supportive of everyone in the class, extremely kind, and created a wonderful class atmosphere. Going to class every morning at 8:50 actually ended up being kind of a pleasure. 
I had a great time in the class, and learned a lot of French. If you're going to take the class with anyone, take it with her. 
Workload:
Standard for an intro language course:
- Weekly work that is submitted online
- Weekly quizzes
- 5 Â¨essaysÂ¨
- Midterm and final
